Articles.Content:
Behold, the SpacePlate!

Just thought I\'d share this ridiculous design with you guys. It had no trouble getting into a high orbit on those mini-engines alone. I expected it to succumb to drag and fail catastrophically, but it didn\'t!
Looks funny but still like a good design...
you know what it looks like to me? a mirror array from a distance, a orbital mirror like Icarus from Tomorrow Never Dies
It looks like a flat white mushroom in space seen from the underside. Does it fly well?
It\'s pretty stable on takeoff, remarkably. Very sluggish though.
